tr.th: CRest v2.0.0 Release Candidate 1 is out!

td.p: CRest v2.0.0 RC1 has been released! Changes include new features, general API improvements and more popular libraries support.

This release candidate is supposed to be production ready, but can be subject to changes/fixes in function of the users feedback, and should be quickly followed either by a RC2 or a final v2.0.0 release.
The major change in this release is the partial support for the JAX-RS v1.1 annotation API, which means you can now feed CRest with a REST interface annotated with the supported JAX-RS annotations.
Unfortunately this release is not retro-compatible with the previous one, but the migration from the old to the new API is quite straightforward.
Please refer to the change report page for a more detailed list of the changes this release comes with.
